entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
